19 
20  WaveletThreshold::WaveletThreshold(unsigned int N, unsigned int ncoeff, double sigma)
21  :
22  mN(N),
23  mMedian(0.0),
24  mThresh(0.0),
25  mNcoeff(ncoeff),
26  mSigma(sigma) {
27  mAbsCoeff = new double[mN];
28  mP = new size_t[mN];
29  mPAC = new size_t[1];
30  mOrd = new double[mN];
31  }
35 
36  WaveletThreshold::~WaveletThreshold() {
37  delete[] mAbsCoeff;
38  delete[] mP;
39  delete[] mPAC;
40  delete[] mOrd;
41  }
42 
43  void WaveletThreshold::operator()(SeqViewDouble &WT, enum WaveletThresholding t, enum ThresholdingMode m) {
44  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
45  mAbsCoeff[i] = fabs(WT(0, i));
46  }
47  gsl_sort_index(mP, mAbsCoeff, 1, mN);
48  gsl_sort_largest_index(mPAC, 1, mAbsCoeff, 1, mN);
49  mlevel = mPAC[0];
50  mC = fabs(WT(0, mlevel));
51  switch (t) {
52  case dohonojohnston: {
53  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++)
54  mOrd[i] = fabs(WT(0, mP[i]));
55  mMedian = gsl_stats_median_from_sorted_data(mOrd, 1, mN);
56  mSigma = mMedian / 0.6745;
57  mThresh = sqrt(2 * log(mN)) * mSigma;
58  switch (m) {
59  case hard: {
60  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
61  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) <= mThresh)
62  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
63  }
64  }
65  break;
66  default: {
67  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
68  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) < mThresh)
69  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
70  else {
71  if (WT(0, i) >= mThresh)
72  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) - mThresh;
73  if (WT(0, i) <= -mThresh)
74  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) + mThresh;
75  }
76  }
77  }
78  }
79  break;
80  case cuoco:
81  mThresh = sqrt(2 * log(mN)) * mSigma;
82  switch (m) {
83  case hard: {
84  //hard threshold
85  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
86  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) <= mThresh)
87  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
88  }
89 
90  }
91  break;
92  default: {
93  //soft threshold
94  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
95  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) < mThresh)
96  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
97  else {
98  if (WT(0, i) >= mThresh)
99  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) - mThresh;
100  if (WT(0, i) <= -mThresh)
101  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) + mThresh;
102  }
103  }
104 
105  }
106  }
107  break;
108 
109  default:
110 
111  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNcoeff; i++) {
112  WT(0, mP[i]) = 0.0;
113  }
114 
115  break;
116  }
117  }
118  }
119 
120  void WaveletThreshold::operator()(Dmatrix &WT, enum WaveletThresholding t, enum ThresholdingMode m) {
121  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
122  mAbsCoeff[i] = fabs(WT(0, i));
123  }
124  gsl_sort_index(mP, mAbsCoeff, 1, mN);
125  gsl_sort_largest_index(mPAC, 1, mAbsCoeff, 1, mN);
126 
127  mlevel = mPAC[0];
128 
129  mC = fabs(WT(0, mlevel));
130 
131 
132  switch (t) {
133  case dohonojohnston: {
134  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++)
135  mOrd[i] = fabs(WT(0, mP[i]));
136  mMedian = gsl_stats_median_from_sorted_data(mOrd, 1, mN);
137  mSigma = mMedian / 0.6745;
138  mThresh = sqrt(2 * log(mN)) * mSigma;
139  switch (m) {
140  case hard: {
141  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
142  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) <= mThresh)
143  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
144  }
145  }
146  break;
147

149  default: {
150

153  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
154  else {
155  if (WT(0, i) >= mThresh)
156  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) - mThresh;
157  if (WT(0, i) <= -mThresh)
158  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) + mThresh;
159  }
160  }
161  }
162  }
163  break;
164  case cuoco:
165  mThresh = sqrt(2 * log(mN)) * mSigma;
166  switch (m) {
167  case hard: {
168  //hard threshold
169  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
170  if (fabs(WT(0, i)) <= mThresh)
171  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
172  }
173 
174 
175  }
176 
177  break;
178  default: {
179  //soft threshold
180  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {

182  WT(0, i) = 0.0;
183  else {
184  if (WT(0, i) >= mThresh)
185  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) - mThresh;
186  if (WT(0, i) <= -mThresh)
187  WT(0, i) = WT(0, i) + mThresh;
188  }
189  }
190 
191  }
192  }
193  break;
194 
195  default:
196

198  WT(0, mP[i]) = 0.0;
199  }

202  }
